title: Marketing website for IT consulting firm (virtualization + on‑prem IA for government contracts)

requirements.text: Create a responsive marketing website for an IT consulting company specializing in virtualization and on‑prem infrastructure / IA work for government contracts.

quotes: Can u build me a website that will for my IT consulting company that works virtualization and on prem IA for government contracts

acceptanceCriteria: Site renders correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints
Clear positioning statement references virtualization and on‑prem infrastructure/IA for government contracts
All user-facing text is in English

requirements.text: Implement core site pages/sections with clear navigation: Home (hero + value proposition), Services, Capabilities (government contracting/IA-focused), About, and Contact.

quotes: website ... for my IT consulting company ... virtualization and on prem IA for government contracts

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation links scroll or route to each major section/page
Each section contains concise, professional copy and headings relevant to virtualization, on‑prem infrastructure, and IA for government work
Layout remains readable and usable without horizontal scrolling at common viewport widths

requirements.text: Add a Contact form that collects name, organization, email, and message, validates inputs, and submits to the backend; show success and error states.

quotes: build me a website ... for my IT consulting company

acceptanceCriteria: Form validates required fields and email format before submit
On successful submit, user sees a confirmation state and the form resets
On failure, user sees an error message and can retry

requirements.text: Implement backend support to store contact inquiries (timestamped) and expose query methods to list and read inquiries for an authenticated admin user using Internet Identity.

quotes: build me a website ... for my IT consulting company

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores inquiries persistently in the single main Motoko actor
Each stored inquiry includes submitted fields plus createdAt timestamp
Backend provides a method to create an inquiry and a method to list inquiries restricted to an admin principal
Unauthorized principals cannot list inquiries

requirements.text: Add an admin-only UI view that lets a signed-in admin review submitted contact inquiries (basic list + detail view).

quotes: build me a website ... for my IT consulting company

acceptanceCriteria: Admin view requires Internet Identity sign-in
Non-admin users cannot access inquiry listings in the UI
Admin can view a list of inquiries and open an inquiry to see full details

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a government-facing IT consultancy (color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) and enforce it consistently across all pages/sections (avoid blue/purple as the dominant theme).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across headings, body text, buttons, cards, and navigation
Primary palette is not predominantly blue/purple
Design feels professional, high-trust, and accessible (sufficient contrast for text and controls)

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets (logo + hero visual) to the frontend and render them in the layout (e.g., navbar/hero) from the static assets directory.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are included as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated
Logo is used in the site header/navigation
Hero visual is used in the Home hero section and scales responsively

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).

Do not edit any files under frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose these instead).
No third-party authentication providers; only Internet Identity for admin access.
No external databases or external email/SMS providers.
nonGoals: Implementing a full CRM, ticketing system, or real-time chat
Sending emails from the contact form via third-party email services
Building a multi-tenant portal for multiple clients/agencies

required: Wide hero illustration of an on‑prem data center / virtualization concept in a clean, modern style (hero-datacenter.dim_1600x900.png)
